name: Jumper Duck
description:
Jumper Duck is a simple game where you need to dodge and click multiple foes, the game was made for the Mini Jam, and the limitation was "no ground". this is my first proper game on Scratch, so expect to see more if you like this game!  

Laser: Don't get near the big red laser, a warning will appear, so you can't miss it.

Bob: He will appear at random at a random place, click him or he will call you some seeds, the irresistible 

DuckE: you are DuckE, just click to jump, pretty simple

Thanks To:

Even King (Context Sensitive) for the in-game music. https://contextsensitive.bandcamp.com/

Pixel art ( thats the name) for the pixel art software

Mini Jam's Staff for arranging this event

Mini Jam's Discord for some really important feedback, I'm looking at you farmdogs!

If you don't want to download some weird file, the scratch version can be found here

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/785008368/
